name: KapabelSDK
summary: This is the frameword needed to add Kapabel to your app.
description: Kapabel is a framwork that is useful for educational apps. Kapabel is a web service developed to increase student learning when using iPad in the classroom. Kapabel keeps track of which apps are being used and how the students are solving problems inside the apps. We then give teachers access to data on student performance in detailed reports on individual students and the class as a whole. In our educational apps catalogue teachers can find the best apps to use based on recommendations from other teachers.
